attributes.action: To take Pakistan off red travel list and act on scientific date and figures
attributes.additional_details: Treat every country equally disregarding political strength or economical power.And base decisions on scientific date and figures.If that was the case America  India , France ,Germany would be on the red travel list well before Pakistan.So why is the British government treating its uk Pakistani community in a unfair way.Please debate this issue and reassess your decision.
attributes.background: To treat Pakistan fairly and use the same science led approach for every country in a equal and fair way not led by economic power or political infulance .
